exam.question: In spite of the ______ economic forecasts, manufacturing output has risen slightly.

answer.explain: 句意： 尽管经济前景黯淡， 但制造业的产量仍有少量增长。miserable： 悲惨的； shadowy： 有阴影的， 阴凉的； obscure： 朦胧的。

sentences.sContent: The report paints a gloomy picture of the economy.
sentences.sCn: 这篇报告描绘了一幅惨淡的经济现状。

sentences.sContent: ...The report from the Bureau of Labor Statistics was just as gloomy as anticipated...

words.tran: 变阴暗；变忧沉；感到沮丧

trans.tranCn: 忧郁的， 沮丧的； 令人沮丧的； 昏暗的， 阴沉的
trans.tranOther: making you feel that things will not improve
